text: Pargais was a settlement and station (mutatio) of ancient Cilicia, on the road between Adana and Tarsus, inhabited during Byzantine times. Its site is located near Gökçeler in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Cilicia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of Adana Province
title: Pargais
